name: The Night We Met
message: In the quiet darkness, our eyes met and time stood still. That moment, wrapped in stardust and possibility, became the first light in our constellation.

name: Our First Laugh
message: Your laughter echoed through the universe, a melody that made every star shine brighter. I knew then that my heart had found its home.

name: Morning Light
message: Every sunrise with you feels like witnessing the birth of a new galaxy—full of warmth, wonder, and infinite possibility.

name: Silent Conversations
message: In the spaces between words, we speak a language only our souls understand. A connection deeper than the cosmos itself.

name: Dancing in Starlight
message: When we dance, it's as if the stars themselves are choreographing our movements, writing poetry in motion across the night sky.

name: Your Smile
message: Your smile is a supernova—brilliant, beautiful, and capable of illuminating the darkest corners of my universe.

name: Whispers in the Dark
message: Your whispers carry the secrets of distant galaxies, and in them, I find the map to your heart—my favorite constellation.

name: Forever Begins
message: Forever isn't long enough when it's with you. But if forever is what we have, then forever is what I'll choose, again and again.
